title: Personal Space Invasion: What Happens When Someone Invades Your Personal Space?
itunes:title: Personal Space Invasion: What Happens When Someone Invades Your Personal Space?
description: Do feel slightly uncomfortable in the bathroom? How does the presence of others in the bathroom affect you? What about places other than the bathroom? How close is too close? A psychological study was done in 1976 in which psychology researchers hid in men's bathrooms to observe...well, you'll find out. Learn more about personal space in this episode of The Psych Files.
